data.title: The Hudson Advisory Team - 1025 5th #10GN Manhattan, NY 10028
data.meta_description: Residence 10GN at 1025 Fifth Avenue is an elegant and spacious 2 Bedroom/ 2 Bath home along Fifth Avenues Museum Mile.Enter through the formal gallery which sets the tone for gracious living. The south facing living room and dining area feature a wall of southern windows offering skyline views, copious light, and seamless flow for entertaining and gathering. The eat-in kitchen has abundant white wood cabinetry with an island cooktop and washer/dryer. A separate room off the kitchen functions as a home office or walk-in pantry. The 2nd bedroom, currently configured as a library/den, offers a western peek of the Met and a full bath. The primary suite is large and peaceful with an ensuite bath, walk-in closet plus two additional closets. 1025 Fifth Avenue is a full service co op residence with 24 hour doorman, concierge and beautifully landscaped courtyard gardens. Added amenities include: a garage in building with a discounted rate of 340 for shareholders, fitness center, storage bins, bike room. 75 financing, 2 flip tax paid by purchaser, pieds a terre permitted, pets with Board approval. Steps from Central Park, the Metropolitan Museum of Art, Madison Avenue boutique shopping and restaurants, 1025 Fifth Avenue is the height of luxury living in Carnegie Hill.
data.text:
Description

Residence 10GN at 1025 Fifth Avenue is an elegant and spacious 2 Bedroom/ 2 Bath home along Fifth Avenues Museum Mile.Enter through the formal gallery which sets the tone for gracious living. The south facing living room and dining area feature a wall of southern windows offering skyline views, copious light, and seamless flow for entertaining and gathering. The eat-in kitchen has abundant white wood cabinetry with an island cooktop and washer/dryer. A separate room off the kitchen functions as a home office or walk-in pantry. The 2nd bedroom, currently configured as a library/den, offers a western peek of the Met and a full bath. The primary suite is large and peaceful with an ensuite bath, walk-in closet plus two additional closets. 1025 Fifth Avenue is a full service co op residence with 24 hour doorman, concierge and beautifully landscaped courtyard gardens. Added amenities include: a garage in building with a discounted rate of 340 for shareholders, fitness center, storage bins, bike room. 75 financing, 2 flip tax paid by purchaser, pieds a terre permitted, pets with Board approval. Steps from Central Park, the Metropolitan Museum of Art, Madison Avenue boutique shopping and restaurants, 1025 Fifth Avenue is the height of luxury living in Carnegie Hill.
